question: Which of the following is true regarding why diversity marketing is important?

answers.text: Today’s marketplace is changing dramatically everywhere.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Studies show that diversity marketing has an impact on brand loyalty.

answers.text: Buyers, households, and communities are staying the same.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Studies show that consumers believe that diversity in advertising is important.

answers.text: Consumers don’t believe that diversity in advertising is important.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Buyers, households, and communities are changing.

answers.text: Diversity marketing has no impact on brand loyalty.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Diversity marketing is important because today’s marketplace is changing dramatically everywhere.

detailedSolution: Diversity marketing is important because today’s marketplace is changing dramatically everywhere.
